column1: News title :Govt officials given shield from arrest
Description :Parliament last night passed the Sarkari Chakri Bill-2018 with a discriminatory provision
column2: which makes it mandatory for the Anti-Corruption Commission to take permission from the appropriate authorities before arresting any government official on charges related to their job.

News title :Clinical Tigers seal series
Description :The mantra of putting a collective approach ahead of individual heroics paid dividends as a clinical Bangladesh clinched the three-match ODI series with a game to spare
column2: handing Zimbabwe a comprehensive seven-wicket defeat at the Zahur Ahmed Chowdhury stadium in Chattogram yesterday.

News title :AL leaflets areas near rally venue
Description :Hours before Jatiya Oikyafront's maiden rally on Registrar's office ground in Bandarbazar area
column2: ruling Awami League men from across the city started gathering in processions at Court Point
column3: around 100 feet away from Oikyafront's venue.

column2: the newly-floated alliance of the BNP and several other parties

News title :Magic lamp in Sylhet
Description :Among the 19 constituencies in Sylhet division
column2: Sylhet-1 has always been the general election bellwether for parties. Every party that had won this constituency since the restoration of democracy in 1991
column3: went on to form the government.

News title :Proposed Reception to PM: Rift in Hefajat
Description :Cracks have surfaced within the Hefajat-e Islam over a proposed public reception to Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina
column2: prompting the Islamist group's senior nayeb-e-ameer Mohibullah Babunagari to resign.

News title :Jatiya Oikyafront aims for a huge turnout in Sylhet

News title :Road Transport: Quader owns up to failure to bring order
Description :Road Transport and Bridges Minister Obaidul Quader yesterday admitted his failure in bringing discipline to the road transport sector.

News title :They were 'picked up' a day before
Description :Three of the four youths found shot dead in Narayanganj on Sunday morning were picked up by detectives from the district's Gausia the previous day
column2: family members claimed after identifying them at a local hospital yesterday.
